column1: '''''Mythos Journal''''' includes the article “Pitfalls in Faërie” by [[Verlyn Flieger]]. This quotes extensively from an unpublished essay by [[J.R.R. Tolkien
* Reprinted in a slightly altered form in A Question of Time (1997) by Verlyn Flieger.
* Reprinted in Saga: Best New Writings on Mythology, ed. Jonathan Young 157-171?
